metadata.title: CVE-2024-50166 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:fsl/fman: Fix refcount handling of fman-related devicesIn mac_probe() there are multiple calls to of_find_device_by_node(),fman_bind() and fman_port_bind() which takes references to of_dev->dev.Not all references taken by these calls are released later on error pathin mac_probe() and in mac_remove() which lead to reference leaks.Add references release.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
